CustomField.formula: IF(HOT_Request__r.IsScreenInterpreter__c != false, 'Digitalt oppm√∏te', (Street + IF(PostalCode != "" && City != "", ", " + PostalCode + " " + City, "") + IF(PostalCode != "" && City = "", ", " + PostalCode, "") + IF(PostalCode = "" && City != "", ", " + City, "")))
CustomField.label: Address
